about.title: About Me
about.description: DevOps professional with experience in Linux systems and production environments, specialized in deployment automation, containers, and change traceability. Experience collaborating with development teams to ensure stability, quality, and service continuity through CI/CD practices.
about.mission: My approach focuses on continuous integration, process automation, and critical systems maintenance, applying production-oriented best practices and ensuring application availability in corporate environments.

jobs.title: Software Developer and DevOps
jobs.description: Participation in the definition, execution, and monitoring of CI/CD pipelines. Integration of version control and deployment traceability aligned with Jira.
highlights: Definition, execution, and monitoring of CI/CD pipelines
Integration of version control and deployment traceability aligned with Jira
Collaboration in operational tasks related to deployments and environment stability

jobs.title: Systems and Implementation Technician
jobs.description: Administration and maintenance of Linux systems (Debian) and Tomcat servers, ensuring application availability in production environments. Management of Docker containers and associated services for corporate applications.
highlights: Administration and maintenance of Linux systems (Debian) and Tomcat servers in production
Management of Docker containers and associated services for corporate applications
Implementation, configuration, and support of software in public administrations
Evolutionary and corrective maintenance of proprietary applications
Support and maintenance of PL/SQL databases
Technical incident resolution prioritizing stability and service continuity

jobs.title: Systems Technician
jobs.description: Installation, configuration, and maintenance of computer equipment in corporate environments. Deployment of operating systems and software, ensuring proper functionality and stability.
highlights: Installation, configuration, and maintenance of computer equipment
Deployment of operating systems and software
Basic configuration of local networks and connectivity
Technical support to users and first-level incident resolution
